          <title>
            <string language="en">Tightening a bolt using a spanner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Festziehen eines Schraubbolzens mit einem 
Schlüssel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Serrage d'un boulon à l'aide d'une clé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apertando um parafuso usando uma chave de boca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fissaggio del bullone per mezzo di una chiave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκλήρυνση ενός μπουλονιού που χρησιμοποιεί ένα 
κλειδί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ajuste de un perno usando a una llave de tuercas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the turning force and movement direction of the spanner to tighten a bolt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spanner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tightening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die drehenkraft- und 
Bewegungsrichtung des Schlüssels, um einen Schraubbolzen 
festzuziehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la direction de 
rotation de force et de mouvement de la clé serrait un boulon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sentido de giro da 
força e do movimento da chave de boca para apertar um parafuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il senso di rotazione
del movimento e della forza della chiave per stringere un bullone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γυρίζοντας κατεύθυνση 
δύναμης και μετακίνησης του κλειδιού για να σφίγξει ένα 
μπουλόνι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la dirección de la 
fuerza que da vuelta y del movimiento de la llave de tuercas para 
apretar un perno.</string>
          </description>
